mapper.update:
update p_cart
`uid` = #{uid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
goodsId = #{goodsId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
orderId = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
suitId = #{suitId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
suitName = #{suitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goodsName = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`number` = #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER},
isKnot = #{isKnot,jdbcType=INTEGER},
createTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update p_cart set `uid` = #{uid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, goodsId = #{goodsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, orderId = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, suitId = #{suitId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, suitName = #{suitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goodsName = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `number` = #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER}, isKnot = #{isKnot,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select c.id,c.orderId,c.uid,c.goodsId,c.suitId,c.price,c.suitName,c.goodsName,c.number,c.createTime,g.hostImg from p_cart c left join p_goods g on c.goodsId = g.id where orderId = #{0}
